posts.post_content:
Hi, I would like to sell a T205 Camnitz.  I bought this on ebay because of the paper that was adhered to the back and I wanted to soak it off.  

Ten bucks shipped.  Any type of payment is fine.  Please email [url]rickmcquillan@gmail.com[/url]

THIS CARD HAS BEEN SOAKED.  I HAVE POSTED BEFORE AND AFTER SCANS.

Thank you,  Rick
